channel.title: Instagram on Nikolai Nekrutenko
channel.description: Recent content in Instagram on Nikolai Nekrutenko

item.title: New Instagram Account
item.description:
It’s been a while since I’ve posted anything on social media, with YouTube being the only exception. I wouldn’t even go as far as to call it social media. In fact, it’s almost been three years since I posted anything on my personal instagram account @nikolaiteslovich.

I don’t know why I stopped. I guess it just happened.

These times are now gone, with the commencement of a new Instagram account: @projectniknek which you should totally follow by the way. I created this to show the world what I’m doing with my time: hobbies and projects.
